title: Mouse Sensitivity
body: Does anybody know a way to decrease mouse sensitivity by an amount lower than 5? I'm playing at 15 sensitivity which is a little too sensitive but when I got down to 10 its too low. {{item:3070}} Feelsbadman{{item:3070}}

replies.body: What kind of mouse are you using? Is it just a simple mouse with no software, or does it have software that you configure settings separately from League?
